messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] adults insulting children
messages.msgSnippet: Subject: Re: Re: Adults Insulting Children ... it ... I have used They ll need to drive a car one day,  guess I ll give em the keys and make them learn to
messages.messageBody:
Subject: Re: Re: Adults Insulting Children



>
> > -=-"Yes, someday they will need to have sex, so let's have them
> practice it
> > while they are children!"
> >
> >
> My analogy has been "would breaking his finger now prepare him for a
> possible
> broken leg later?"

>>>or sooner or later he'll come in contact with alcohol, so why not put
it
>n a bottle and give him while he's a baby so he can get adjusted to it
>early?

I have used "They'll need to drive a car one day, guess I'll give 'em
the keys and make them learn to drive a car now."

I like these all...will have to file them away in my mind for later use.
Susan
